CohortContrast 0.0.0.900
  • Reference
  • Articles
    Introduction

    Function reference

    All functions

    C2TCaller()
    This function acts as a Cohort2Trajectory wrapper
    CohortContrast()
    CohortContrast analysis function After running this function on your CDM instance successfully you can either use the extracted outputs or run the CohortContrast shiny app.
    cohortFromCSV()
    Read cohort from CSV
    cohortFromCohortTable()
    Read cohort from database cohort table
    cohortFromDataTable()
    Read cohort from data.frame object
    cohortFromJSON()
    Read cohort from JSON
    createC2TInput()
    Function for creating dataset which can be used as input for Cohort2Trajectory package
    createControlCohortInverse()
    Function for creating automatic matches based on inverse control logic
    createControlCohortMatching()
    Function for creating automatic matches based on age and sex
    generateMappingTable()
    Create a mapping table with predefined mmaximum abstraction level
    getHeatmapPlot()
    Generate a Heatmap Plot
    getPrevalencePlot()
    Generate a Prevalence Plot
    getTimePlot()
    Generate a Time panel Plot
    resolveCohortTableOverlaps()
    Resolve overlaps inside the cohort table
    runCohortContrastGUI()
    This function initiates the connection with database and starts Shiny application
    runTrajectoryViz()
    This function start up TrajectoryViz package GUI with the C2T output

    Developed by Markus Haug, Raivo Kolde.
